Summary: 4 ufos hovering and then ascended out of sight, 1 ufo bright pulsating white light every 1-2 seconds - seemed really far (maybe satellite distance)
divs: sighting details4 of us witnessed 4 ufos hovering\flying over dearborn mi at around 9 pm on sept. 3 2013. one after another they seem to ascend out of this earth..their lights seemed to become smaller and smaller until their lights faded away( this happened pretty quickly- within seconds) the ufos looked like a red orange-ish color (like the fireball description). after a minute, we start seeing this pulsating bright white light(every second or two) (seemed to be about satellite distance) but it seemed to be moving because it was not stationery. after a minute or two we start seeing 2 crafts (probably stealth planes) with green and red flashing lights on each craft flying at a really high altitude around the same area were the 4 ufo and 1 bright pulsating lights were. i captured this with a photo and video. video is too large to submit.+
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Dearborn
There were no other sightings in Dearborn on or around September 3rd 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
